## Task 1
```{r}
plot(1, xlim = c(0, 100), ylim = c(0,100), type="n")
```

## Task 2
```{r}
x1 = c(20, 20, 40, 40)
y1 = c(20, 40, 20, 40)
x2 = c(40, 40, 20, 20)
y2 = c(40, 20, 40, 20)
plot(x1, y1, xlim = c(0, 100), ylim = c(0,100), type="p")
lines(x1, y1)
lines(x2, y2)
```

## Task 3
```{r}
a = seq(0,(2*pi), by = .05)
x3 = (sin(a)*40) + 50
y3 = (cos(a)*40) + 60
plot(x3, y3, xlim = c(0, 100), ylim = c(0,100), type="p")
```
